annot:
[Create a new volume](https://fly.io/docs/flyctl/volumes-create/) called `storage` tied to this app, with size 2GB. I may be building 1GB Docker images on this machine...

I choose a region nearish to me to put this volume. My VM is going to mount this volume, so it will be tied to the hardware this volume is on.
